fields.name: Count
fields.description: Number of records returned in the current response. In the case of paging, this is the number of records in the current page.

fields.name: Data
fields.description: Query output in JObject array or Table format.

fields.name: ResultTruncated
fields.description: Indicates whether the query results are truncated.

fields.name: SkipToken
fields.description: When present, the value can be passed to a subsequent query call (together with the same query and scopes used in the current request) to retrieve the next page of data.

fields.name: TotalRecords
fields.description: Number of total records matching the query.
